{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
Calculator(10, 20)

currently holding 10 and 20 numbers
{% endraw %}

Let's test out plus and minus methods.

{% raw %} 
c1 = Calculator(10, 20)
assert c1.plus() == 30
assert c1.minus() == -10
{% endraw %}
